file_content.text: Our troops were in position to take control of that base. Where was your backup?
Hitting one of Broga's convoys. Like my orders from the Cartel said.
The Cartel isn't in charge here, I am. And you'll follow Imperial orders first.
I ain't one of your drones, fancy britches. I work for pay. Good pay.
And you won't see a cred unless we defeat the Republic. Understand now?
